examples.example: 街头有各种美味的小吃，让人们感受到生活的多姿多彩。

translate.english: There are all kinds of delicious snacks on the street, which makes people feel the colorful life.

examples.example: 每次去小吃街，我都能感受到浓浓的烟火气息和快乐氛围。

translate.english: Every time I go to the snack street, I can feel the strong atmosphere of fireworks and the happy atmosphere.

examples.example: 我很喜欢和朋友们一起去探索不同的小吃街，享受各种美味的小吃。

translate.english: I really like to explore different snack streets with friends and enjoy all kinds of delicious snacks.
